newsticker-summary: Description appearing on top of Special:NewsTicker

Title of the general settings section in the special page
{{Identical|General}}
newsticker-news:
Label for the input where news are set
{{Identical|News}}
newsticker-class: Label for the input where the news ticker CSS classes are set
newsticker-style: Label for the input where the news ticker CSS styling is set
newsticker-pages:
Label for the input where the number of pages with the news ticker is set
{{Identical|Page}}
newsticker-page1: Title of the first page section in the special page
newsticker-page2: Title of the second page section in the special page

newsticker-page7: Title of the seventh page section in the special page
newsticker-page8: Title of the eight page section in the special page

Label for input where the title of the page is set
{{Identical|Title}}
newsticker-add-page: Label for the button for adding another page
newsticker-default-news-help: Set the default news of the news ticker, one per line, wikitext allowed. They be overridden on a per-page basis (see below).
newsticker-default-class-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker default CSS classes are set
newsticker-default-style-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker default CSS styling is set
newsticker-pages-help: Help text for the input where the number of pages with the news ticker is set
newsticker-title-help: Help text for the input where the title of the page with the news ticker is set
newsticker-news-help: Help text for the input where the news are set
newsticker-class-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker CSS classes are set
newsticker-style-help: Help text for the input where the news ticker CSS styling is set
